curam.omega3.request
Interface RequestHandler

public interface RequestHandler

The interface for all request handlers. To instantiate a request handler, use the RequestHandlerFactory class.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getSystemParameters()
          Gets a HTML parameter string containing the name=value pairs of all the parameters required by the CDEJ system.
 void setValidationDecision(java.lang.Boolean decision)
          Sets internal field to hold form checking result for optional validation.
 

Method Detail

getSystemParameters

java.lang.String getSystemParameters()
                                     throws RequestException
Gets a HTML parameter string containing the name=value pairs of all the parameters required by the CDEJ system. The string will contain properly encoded name=value pairs separated by "&" characters. This can be appended to a URL used for redirection, etc. If no parameters are available, an empty string is returned, so it can still be added to another string without the need for any null-checking.

Returns:
The parameter string.
Throws:
RequestException - If the parameters cannot be encoded.

setValidationDecision

void setValidationDecision(java.lang.Boolean decision)
Sets internal field to hold form checking result for optional validation.

Parameters:
decision - Boolean object to set the internal field value to.
